Description.SourceString: Some characters have multiple Reflex Actions that can trigger at the same time. When this occurs, you will see a Combo Action. Hitting the Combo Action button will cause all the triggered Reflex Actions to succeed.
Description.LocalizedString: Some characters have multiple Reflex Actions that can trigger at the same time. When this occurs, you will see a Combo Action. Hitting the Combo Action button will cause all the triggered Reflex Actions to succeed.
